obout.title: Про мене
obout.description:
Hi! I'm Serhii, a passionate software developer with over 5 years of professional experience — and even more years of genuine curiosity. My journey in programming began back in 2008 with web templates and HTML/CSS, later evolving into full-stack web development with JavaScript and PHP. I've built custom CMS platforms, optimized and customized over 30 WordPress sites, and developed several commercial Android apps — one of which surpassed 12,000 downloads on Google Play.

In recent years, I've focused heavily on mobile development using Kotlin and Flutter, creating apps for e-commerce and AI-powered tools with ChatGPT API. I also have experience building Chrome extensions, working with microcontrollers (Arduino, ESP8266), and integrating modern AI technologies.

I love turning ideas into working products — clean, efficient, and user-focused.

productSteps.title: Product Creation Stages
productSteps.description: Every IT solution is based on a consistent process. We move step by step: discussing the idea, designing the concept, testing the MVP, and launching the finished product into the world.

discussion.title: Discussion
discussion.description: At this stage, we gather ideas, share thoughts, and define the key needs of the future product. It’s a space for discussions, questions, and finding solutions. Together we shape the vision that will become the foundation for the next steps.

design.title: Design
design.description: Here the plan is born. We create the structure, think through the logic, and define the appearance of the product. This stage helps us understand how the solution will look and function even before development begins.

mvp.title: MVP
mvp.description: The Minimum Viable Product allows us to bring the core features to life. It’s a working version that helps validate hypotheses, test the idea with real users, and gather valuable feedback.
